entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Friday 28 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High plus 3.
